name: Qualtrics
description: Founded in 2002, our company has spent over 21 years working with the industries that impact you every day. From retail to government to healthcare, we’ve been on a mission to bring humanity, connection, and empathy back to business. We are more than a platform—we are the creators and stewards of the Experience Management category serving over 19,000 clients globally. Building a category demands grit, determination, and unconventional thinking—primarily, it thrives on dedicated, high-functioning teams committed to customer service. That's our specialty.

enhanced_description: Founded in 2002, Qualtrics is a pioneer and leader in the Experience Management (XM) category, serving over 19,000 clients globally. Recognized as the #1 XM Platform and a leader in IDC Analyst Reports, Qualtrics provides software designed to bring humanity, connection, and empathy back to business. The platform empowers organizations to improve frontline experiences, build high-functioning teams, and innovate products. It specifically offers solutions for Customer Experience (optimizing digital and physical touchpoints), Employee Experience (engaging teams, improving manager effectiveness, and informing people and business decisions), and Strategy & Research (designing products, increasing market share, and accelerating growth).
